settings.main_heading_text: Transform Your Mirror With a Custom Frame
settings.main_information_text: Add a beautiful frame to your existing bathroom mirror in less than 30 minutes with our easy-install frame kits.

settings.title: “These made-to-order frames can be installed in less than 20 minutes and you won’t even need to take the mirror off the wall.”
“Unlike others, these are precut and have adhesive backing so they’ll stick around your existing mirror.”
“It’s removable, but so good-looking that your landlord may ask you to leave it.”
“Dress up an unframed, wall-mounted mirror with easy-to-install trim. Available in more than 65 styles and colors.”
“Tired of looking at that basic bathroom mirror? The online shop MirrorMate will make a custom frame that’s ridiculously easy to install.”
1. Pick a style
settings.inner_information_text: Explore 65+ styles to find the perfect frame kit for your bathroom mirror

settings.title: 2. Measure your mirror
settings.inner_information_text: Add your mirror’s specific measurements and order your frame

settings.title: 3. Install your frame
settings.inner_information_text: Whether your mirror sits on a backsplash, runs into a wall, or has clips on it, our mirror frames are designed to fit

settings.main_information_text: Our easy-to-assemble mirror frame kits adhere directly to your mirror, covering any clips or metal strips, all in under 30 minutes.
settings.main_information_mobile_text: Our easy-to-assemble mirror frame kits adhere directly to your mirror, covering any clips or metal strips, all in under 30 minutes.
settings.main_detail_text: Order today, ships from Charlotte, NC by

settings.Custom_Short_Description: Our custom mirror frames are cut to go atop your existing, wall mounted mirror. It's a simple DIY install.

settings.main_button_info: Order today, ships from Charlotte, NC by

settings.title: 1. Set it up
settings.main_information_text: Lay your frame pieces down flat on the floor, and line up the edges. We’ve marked each leg with a top and bottom label to make things easy for you. Slide something flat under each corner that you won’t mind getting glue on (ex. cardboard, drop cloth).

settings.title: 2. Assemble the corners
settings.main_information_text: One corner at a time, lightly apply a thin coat glue of glue, aligning the ends together to form your frame. Insert connectors into each glued corner starting with the short connector in the outer slot. Lightly hammer until flush then repeat with the interior, long connectors.

settings.title: 3. Prepare your mirror
settings.main_information_text: Within 10 minutes of application, wipe off any excess glue from the front of the frame with a damp rag before glue sets. Let glue dry for 20 minutes. Prepare your mirror by cleaning the edges where the frame will apply with the alcohol wipe provided. Allow to dry for 5 minutes so the mounting tape will adhere properly.

settings.title: 4. Align the frame
settings.main_information_text: Locate placement corner blocks and remove tape backing from the blocks. Lift frame into place so that it covers the mirror surface evenly on all sides. Once in place, press the placement corner blocks to both upper inside frame corners, as shown.

settings.title: 5. Press on to install
settings.main_information_text: Take the frame down and peel off the frame’s tape backing. Without touching the frame to the mirror, guide the frame into place using the placement corner blocks. Starting at the top edge, firmly press the frame to your mirror. Run your hand around all edges of the frame to secure it in place.

settings.title: 6. Enjoy!
settings.main_information_text: Remove placement corner blocks and clean any residue with rubbing alcohol if necessary. Stand back and look at your gorgeous, framed mirror.

settings.main_Answer_text: Check our frequently asked questions or email us at info@mirrormate.com.

settings.title: This is stunning!!
settings.main_information_text: I have absolutely loved both frames from Mirrormate. This one was so beautiful and so easy to put up. Highly recommend this company to anyone.

settings.title: Amazing transformation
settings.main_information_text: My frame fit perfectly and was so easy to install. The transformation was night and day, and finally made the bathroom look like it belongs in a beach house.

settings.title: Best purchase ever!
settings.main_information_text: So easy to setup and everything was included in my package exactly as I needed it. Looks amazing in the room. I would recommend this to everyone!

settings.title: Absolutely Stunning
settings.main_information_text: It makes a beautiful statement! If your looking to revamp any of your bathroom mirrors you can’t go wrong with any frames from MirrorMate.
Instantly upgrade new construction or dated, decaying bathroom mirrors with our easy DIY mirror frame kit

settings.title: Designed to fit
settings.inner_information_text: MirrorMate frames are compatible with with almost all rectangular mirrors, including those that rest on a backsplash or touch a side wall, and are even designed to conceal any existing clips and channels.

settings.title: Easy to install (<30 minutes)
settings.inner_information_text: Our DIY frame kits include everything you need to build your frame—you just provide a small hammer. Most customers even report that assembly takes less than 30 minutes.

settings.title: Made from non-warping material
settings.inner_information_text: We make our frames from an environmentally-responsible, strong, non-warping wood-base, and finish them with a moisture-wicking seal designed to last in the bathroom.

settings.title: Crafted in Charlotte, NC
settings.inner_information_text: Our frames are all made to order, built with unparalleled quality and have been used for over a decade (even in high traffic settings such as hotels) – standing the test of time.

settings.title: Backed by a 5-year guarantee
settings.inner_information_text: Your MirrorMate frame fits or we replace it! Plus, our frames come with a 5-year warranty against warping and finish degradation, and are fully returnable.

settings.title: Can I order mirror frame samples?
settings.infos: We encourage you to order samples to see how the frame looks in your bathroom. Samples can be ordered here.

settings.title: How does the product work?
settings.infos: The frame attaches directly to the existing, wall-mounted mirror so you don't need space around it for the frame. It is also why it works even if your mirror sits on a backsplash or runs into a wall. The frame tapes onto the glass with professional grade, double-side 3M tape - guaranteed to last in the bath. If your mirror is attached with clips, no worries! There is a recess in the back of the frame that allows it to fit over the clips. No other frame or store-bought trim has this!

settings.title: How does the frame attach to the mirror?
settings.infos: The frame is pre-taped with professional-grade 3M tape and guaranteed to last in the bath.

settings.title: What is the frame made of?
settings.infos: The vast majority of our frames are made of MDF (Medium Density Fiberboard), an environmentally-responsible, strong, non-warping wood-base. They are then finished with a moisture-impervious decorative wrap and seal. There are a few select styles with a base composite of wood. Each product page provides the exact base composite of that style.

settings.title: Why should I buy a MirrorMate frame instead of a complete framed mirror?
settings.infos: MirrorMate frames are less expensive than most new framed mirrors and they don't require that you remove your existing mirror. This is especially good news if your existing mirrors are glued to the wall, since removing them may damage the wall, and if they break, may cause injury. The additional time and cost of repairing the wall, plus disposal of mirrors into a landfill make MirrorMate frames even more cost-effective. MirrorMate frames are easy to install, requiring no special tools or skills. They work with any rectangular-shaped mirror and are available in a variety of styles to fit any decor.

settings.title: Will I see the mirror edge under the frame from the side?
settings.infos: Where there is space we extend the frame beyond the mirror up to 5/8 inch - to create the illusion that the raw edge of the mirror is covered. If your mirror has zero clearance on a side then we do not extend the frame on that side and the frame will be flush with the edge of the mirror. Please note - our frames DO NOT wrap around the edge of the mirror.

settings.title: Do you sell mirrors too?
settings.infos: No. Our frames are for pre-existing, wall-mounted mirrors.

settings.title: Do you sell frames for oval mirrors?
settings.infos: No, just for square and rectangular mirrors.
